title: Dynamic queue is so harder to climb
body: Ever since dynamic queue i find it really frustrating to win when i have a premade on my team, the way it goes is either one "premade" is better than the other and therefore has more synergy to win easier, and i've been getting the other bad side of the premades on my team. All my friends from school are bad and i just want to rank solo without having to see the same club names in champion select ever so often. I do not have the synergy or the communication to be able to communicate with the premades making things really unfair since they would ussually have a jungle to gank often and I cant call for backup because my side is ussually always camping his mate down at his lane. They are also usually very toxic towards me and choose the most non meta picks (ie jg renek) and there is nothing i can really do but dodge. However this is just my opinion so don't say that i'm bad and all and carry harder etc, i just would want solo queue back for having a less fustrating time playing and knowing i wont be wombo combo'd by some fellows with the same club name.

replies.body:
I feel like people are just using Dynamic Queue as a scapegoat this season for their complaints in ranked.

Toxicity, jungler ignoring top and non-meta troll picks, aren't issues that suddenly appeared with Dynamic Queue. Those issues have been around since about season 2, the only difference is that this season you can blame Dynamic Queue.

I hate Dynamic Queue as well, but those aren't the problems it caused. It mainly changed the meaning of ranked and ruined high elo match-making. If you wanna read more about that, I've made a post [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NMXLepVuN1HpYz7ORXgcsiENB-8HDBOiH3d3DxT8-6k/edit?usp=sharing) on all the issues that Dynamic Queue actually caused.

On top of what Tele has said, take a read at [this](http://splitpush.net/articles/lol/opinion/one-man-army-solo-queue-needs-die/) article about how dynamic queue can and will actually produce better players in the long run.
Rank is like life, you have to get through to the bad shet to accomplish something
Ranked can't be serious when dynamics are mixed with solos. Just enjoy Normal's.
